articles.title: Lego launches 'posters' you can build, including Darth Vader, Iron Man, Marilyn Monroe - CNET
articles.description: Lego releases a new line of build-your-own portraits that includes a canvas and bead-size pieces.
articles.content:
The Lego Art sets include portraits of Star Wars Sith characters Darth Maul, Darth Vader and Kylo Ren. 
Lego
